title: ApicurioRegistryDevServicesBuildTimeConfig uses `apicurio-registry-mem:2.2.3.Final`, newer versions are available

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Describe the bug

ApicurioRegistryDevServicesBuildTimeConfig uses `apicurio-registry-mem:2.2.3.Final`, newer versions are available

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blame/main/extensions/schema-registry/devservice/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/apicurio/registry/devservice/ApicurioRegistryDevServicesBuildTimeConfig.java#L34

https://quay.io/repository/apicurio/apicurio-registry-mem?tab=tags&tag=latest - `2.2.5.Final` or `2.3.1.Final` are available
